reviewText: How to Murder a Millionaire is not a great movie but it's not a bad one either.  It's a fun little movie to watch with some good laughs.  I know Joan Rivers can be irritating at times but she's not so bad in this.  I especially liked the scene in the salon when she is getting her legs waxed.

The first time I happened to tune into this 1990 TV-made movie I just couldn't stop myself laughing. It's a zany comedy whereby Beverly Hills housewife Irma Summers (Joan Rivers) mistakenly believes her husband is trying to murder her. Wacky, far-out situations follow.

I have waited for years for this film to be released on DVD and thought today I'd check to see if it had appeared on amazon. Shock of shocks it is finally is out! ONE OF JOAN'S BEST ACTING ROLES!
Joan rivers and Telma Hopkins rule in this great comedy spoof. It's a must see!!!
Hilarious movie!! Joan Rivers is an all time fav!
wasn't as funny as I had hoped
You will laugh from start to finish. I love it.  I use it as a great pick me up.

I never heard of this movie but I love Joan Rivers so I decided to buy it on a whim.  I am SO glad I did!  This movie is hysterical!!!  I like early 90's comedy movies as they aren't as crass as the shi* nowadays.  Highly recommend!  this is also pretty hard to find so you might want to snap it up before they jack up the prices.
Great , You can keep see it over and over
Nothing to write home to mother about

I WATCHED THIS SHOW WITH MY MOTHER MANY YEARS AGO. SADLY SHE IS PASSED ON. BUT OVER THE YEARS I WANTED TO WATCH THIS MOVIE,BUT COULDNT REMEMBER THE NAME. FINALLY I DID AND HAD A DELIGHTFUL TIME WATCHING IT. AND IT ARRIVED IN MY POST OFFICE BOX SO FAST. THANKS ALOT. APRIL
